title: Special Topics in American Studies; Community Research and Design: Augmented Reality Football Uniform
description:
Restriction: Permission of instructor, Sher Parks.

This interdisciplinary team of students will work with Stephan Fitch, AR/VR industry innovator and UMD Research Associate, to finish the design and production of an augmented reality football uniform and with AMST associate professor Sheri Parks to use empathetic design to research the user experience.
